title: Can't buy Dragon Fist Lee Sin + Lee Sin from Shop

replies.body:
Hey Third Rebirth - 

Unfortunately, that's the case. Currently, if something is available in the regular shop, you will receive an error if you're trying to purchase the same content in your personalized offers.
Alright thanks for letting me know. I ended up buying Lee Sin and just used the RP to buy the skin and another one in the shop. All worked out at least. Hope it gets fixed in the future.
Thanks for the follow up! It's something we understand isn't ideal and is something we'd like to be able to resolve in the future. :)
